contents.text1: Advantage Seal (Ningbo) co., LTD, an international leading supplier of industrial sealing technology, is the investment subsidiary of Advantage Seal, a well-known American sealing brand. Since the establishment of Advantage Seal Inc. in Chicago, with its technicians, Mr. Nestor, a famous sealing expert from the United States, has relied on its strong technical strength and rich industry experience to provide sealing solutions for established pump manufacturers, industrial pumps and chemical pumps in the United States and Europe.
contents.text2: In 2006, Mr Liu Hongzhi introduce the Advantage Seal technology and established Advantage Seal (Ningbo) co., LTD. The company inherits the core technology, strictly implements the American sealing technology standard, uses the advanced ERP advanced Management software, and comprehensively implements Lean Manufacturing Management. Over the years, we always perform 'Ensure that the first product is of the same quality as the last one "concept, greatly enhance the enterprise core competitiveness. At the same time we win the trust of customers, become the hearts of many core customers' reliable suppliers!
contents.text3: Customer's trust is our honor! Customer recognition is the highest praise for us!
